titles.title: A bill to renew the temporary suspsension of duty on certain footwear consisting of an outer sole affixed to an incomplete or unfinished upper.
A bill to renew the temporary suspsension of duty on certain footwear consisting of an outer sole affixed to an incomplete or unfinished upper.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on certain footwear consisting of an outer sole affixed to an incomplete or unfinished upper.
